<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To find the named of the imported DLL from an import library, we can either</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inspect the object files that form the import table entries, or we could</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// just look at the archive member names, for MSVC style import libraries.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Looking at the archive member names doesn&#39;t work for GNU style import</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// libraries though, while inspecting the import table entries works for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// both. (MSVC style import libraries contain a couple regular object files</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for the header/trailers.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This implementation does the same as GNU dlltool does; look at the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// content of &quot;.idata$7&quot; sections, or for MSVC style libraries, look</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// at &quot;.idata$6&quot; sections.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For GNU style import libraries, there are also other data chunks in sections</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// named &quot;.idata$7&quot; (entries to the IAT or ILT); these are distinguished</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by seeing that they contain relocations. (They also look like an empty</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// string when looking for null termination.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Alternatively, we could do things differently - look for any .idata$2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// section; this would be import directory entries. At offset 12 in them</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// there is the RVA of the import DLL name; look for a relocation at this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// spot and locate the symbol that it points at. That symbol may either</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be within the same object file (in the case of MSVC style import libraries)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or another object file (in the case of GNU import libraries).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-dlltooldriver-cpp-/#ae6071096c441061cfc9f7b4cf8f4ec9e"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-dlltooldriver-cpp-/#ae6071096c441061cfc9f7b4cf8f4ec9e">identifyImportName</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/object/coffobjectfile">COFFObjectFile</a> &amp;Obj, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> ObjName,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        std::vector&lt;StringRef&gt; &amp;Names, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsMsStyleImplib) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> TargetName = IsMsStyleImplib ? </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.idata$6&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.idata$7&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;S : Obj.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/object/objectfile/#a7f73649118e365a230be4870d824e7cf">sections</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;StringRef&gt;</a> NameOrErr = S.getName();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!NameOrErr) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-dlltooldriver-cpp-/#a024febeb00b1f6fcbb99736eaf8f00d1">printError</a>(NameOrErr.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected/#a94789df4ebd03dc008e8adebaa66ac1f">takeError</a>(), ObjName);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Name != TargetName)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// objects too, but they contain relocations.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Trim off the trailing decoration. Symbols will always have a</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or ? for C++ functions). Vectorcall functions won&#39;t have any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fixed prefix, but the function base name will still be at least</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// one char.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">      E.Name = E.Name.substr(0, E.Name.find(</span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;@&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, 1));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// By making sure E.SymbolName != E.Name for decorated symbols,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// writeImportLibrary writes these symbols with the type</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// IMPORT&#95;NAME&#95;UNDECORATE.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::string Path = std::string(Args.getLastArgValue(OPT&#95;l));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Path.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> E = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/object/#af9d2c5b5d2afb86f9cdaef1946b79f6c">writeImportLibrary</a>(OutputFile, Path, Exports, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#a2e16e55de32fe349f3e8242166918205">Machine</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;MinGW=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, NativeExports)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a2aa0f5c36ac6291f5d5f2b4efd9ffe70">handleAllErrors</a>(std::move(E), &#91;&amp;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/errorinfobase">ErrorInfoBase</a> &amp;EI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9a7b5c68c90f85baaedaa854cc5002cc">llvm::errs</a>() &lt;&lt; EI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/errorinfobase/#a2b75e20ae30dbb4d4d96486653a9b710">message</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
